text: 'Malard and Suburbs Bus Organization (') is a public transport agency running Transit buses in Malard and surrounding areas in Tehran Province. ==List of Routes== {| class="wikitable sortable" |+ |colspan="7" | 750px |- |-bgcolor=#ACE1AF !Colour !Name !Length (km) !Number of Buses !Number of Stations in Malrad urban area !Headway (Min) !Connections |- |text-align="center" bgcolor="#ED1C24" | | Malard-Karaj | 17.5 | 18 | 13 | 15 | x20pxx20pxx15px Karaj Metro Station Shahid Soltani Bus Terminal |- |text-align="center" bgcolor="#880015" | | Malard-Shahriar | 14 | 15 | 18 | 10 | |- |text-align="center" bgcolor="#FF7F27" | | Marlik-Azadi | 46 | 21 | 18 | 10 | x20pxx15px Meydan-e Azadi Metro Station 35px Tehran Western Terminal |- |text-align="center" bgcolor="#22B14C" | | Sarasiab-Azadi | 42 | 37 | 10 | 15 | x20pxx15px Meydan-e Azadi Metro Station 35px Tehran Western Terminal |- |text-align="center" bgcolor="#3F48CC" | | Marlik-Karaj | 20.5 | 18 | 18 | 15 | x20pxx20pxx15px Karaj Metro Station Shahid Soltani Bus Terminal |- |text-align="center" bgcolor="#A349A4" | | Sarasiab-Qods | 22.5 | 9 | 28 | 10 | |- |text-align="center" bgcolor="#00A2E8" | | Shahrak-e Golha-Fardis 5th Sq. | 12 | 8 | 18 | 15 | |- |text- align="center" bgcolor="#01FF00" | | Malard-Bidganeh | 8 | 4 | 15 | 10 | |- |text-align="center" bgcolor="#FF00FF" | | Malard-Qeshlaq | 6 | 2 | 10 | 20 | |} == References== Category:Transport in Iran Category:Malard County Category:Bus transport in Iran
